segments.text: I notice the woman by the sink, she seems so focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But she's missing the water overflowing and creating a puddle around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she hasn't noticed it yet, it's right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids behind her are being so sneaky, I can't help but smile at their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is reaching for the cookie jar, he looks so determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall, that stool looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, she looks so innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the garden outside, it looks so calm and tidy, unlike the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and catches the kids in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just full of surprises, I never know what's going to happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR
